verses.verse: Draw <S%H7126><s%> near, <S%H7126><s%> O nations, <S%H1471><s%> to hear; <S%H8085><s%> and listen, <S%H7181><s%> O peoples! <S%H3816><s%> Let the earth <S%H776><s%> and all it contains <S%H4393><s%> hear, <S%H8085><s%> and the world <S%H8398><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> that springs <S%H6631><s%> from it.

For the Lord's indignation <S%H7110><s%> is against <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the nations, <S%H1471><s%> And [His] wrath <S%H2534><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> their armies; <S%H6635><s%> He has utterly <S%H2763><s%> destroyed <S%H2763><s%> them, He has given <S%H5414><s%> them over to slaughter. <S%H2874><s%>

So their slain <S%H2491><s%> will be thrown <S%H7993><s%> out, And their corpses <S%H6297><s%> will give <S%H5927><s%> off <S%H5927><s%> their stench, <S%H889><s%> And the mountains <S%H2022><s%> will be drenched <S%H4549><s%> with their blood. <S%H1818><s%>

And all <S%H3605><s%> the host <S%H6635><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%> will wear <S%H4743><s%> away, <S%H4743><s%> And the sky <S%H8064><s%> will be rolled <S%H1556><s%> up like a scroll; <S%H5612><s%> All <S%H3605><s%> their hosts <S%H6635><s%> will also wither <S%H5034><s%> away <S%H5034><s%> As a leaf <S%H5929><s%> withers <S%H5034><s%> from the vine, <S%H1612><s%> Or as [one] withers <S%H5034><s%> from the fig <S%H8384><s%> tree. <S%H8384><s%>

For My sword <S%H2719><s%> is satiated <S%H7301><s%> in heaven, <S%H8064><s%> Behold <S%H2009><s%> it shall descend <S%H3381><s%> for judgment <S%H4941><s%> upon Edom, <S%H9000><s%> And upon the people <S%H5971><s%> whom I have devoted <S%H9172><s%> to destruction. <S%H4941><s%>

The sword <S%H2719><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> is filled <S%H4390><s%> with blood, <S%H1818><s%> It is sated <S%H1878><s%> with fat, <S%H2459><s%> with the blood <S%H1818><s%> of lambs <S%H3733><s%> and goats, <S%H6260><s%> With the fat <S%H2459><s%> of the kidneys <S%H3629><s%> of rams. <S%H352><s%> For the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has a sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> in Bozrah, <S%H1224><s%> And a great <S%H1419><s%> slaughter <S%H2874><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Edom. <S%H9000><s%>

Wild <S%H7214><s%> oxen <S%H7214><s%> shall also fall <S%H3381><s%> with them, And young <S%H6499><s%> bulls <S%H6499><s%> with strong <S%H47><s%> ones; <S%H47><s%> Thus their land <S%H776><s%> shall be soaked <S%H7301><s%> with blood, <S%H1818><s%> And their dust <S%H6083><s%> become <S%H1878><s%> greasy <S%H1878><s%> with fat. <S%H2459><s%>
For the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has a day <S%H3117><s%> of vengeance, <S%H5359><s%> A year <S%H8141><s%> of recompense <S%H7966><s%> for the cause <S%H7379><s%> of Zion. <S%H6726><s%>

And its streams <S%H5158><s%> shall be turned <S%H2015><s%> into pitch, <S%H2203><s%> And its loose <S%H6083><s%> earth <S%H6083><s%> into brimstone, <S%H1614><s%> And its land <S%H776><s%> shall become <S%H1961><s%> burning <S%H1197><s%> pitch. <S%H2203><s%>

It shall not be quenched <S%H3518><s%> night <S%H3915><s%> or day; <S%H3119><s%> Its smoke <S%H6227><s%> shall go <S%H5927><s%> up forever; <S%H5769><s%> From generation <S%H1755><s%> to generation <S%H1755><s%> it shall be desolate; <S%H2717><s%> None <S%H369><s%> shall pass <S%H5674><s%> through it forever <S%H5331><s%> and ever. <S%H5331><s%>

But pelican <S%H6893><s%> and hedgehog <S%H7090><s%> shall possess <S%H3423><s%> it, And owl <S%H3244><s%> and raven <S%H6158><s%> shall dwell <S%H7931><s%> in it; And He shall stretch <S%H5186><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> it the line <S%H6957><s%> of desolation <S%H8414><s%> And the plumb <S%H68><s%> line <S%H68><s%> of emptiness. <S%H922><s%>

Its nobles <S%H2715><s%> – there <S%H369><s%> is no <S%H369><s%> one <S%H369><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> [Whom] they may proclaim <S%H7121><s%> king <S%H4410><s%> – And all <S%H3605><s%> its princes <S%H8269><s%> shall be nothing. <S%H657><s%>

And thorns <S%H9359><s%> shall come <S%H5927><s%> up in its fortified <S%H4013><s%> towers, <S%H759><s%> Nettles <S%H7057><s%> and thistles <S%H2336><s%> in its fortified <S%H4013><s%> cities; <S%H4013><s%> It shall also be a haunt <S%H5116><s%> of jackals <S%H8565><s%> [And] an abode <S%H2681><s%> of ostriches. <S%H3284><s%>

And the desert <S%H9478><s%> creatures <S%H9478><s%> shall meet <S%H6298><s%> with the wolves, <S%H338><s%> The hairy <S%H9617><s%> goat <S%H8163><s%> also shall cry <S%H7121><s%> to its kind; <S%H7453><s%> Yes, <S%H389><s%> the night <S%H3917><s%> monster <S%H3917><s%> shall settle <S%H7280><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> And shall find <S%H4672><s%> herself a resting <S%H4494><s%> place. <S%H4494><s%>

The tree <S%H7091><s%> snake <S%H7091><s%> shall make <S%H7077><s%> its nest <S%H7077><s%> and lay <S%H4422><s%> [eggs] there, <S%H8033><s%> And it will hatch <S%H1234><s%> and gather <S%H1716><s%> [them] under its protection. <S%H6738><s%> Yes, <S%H389><s%> the hawks <S%H1772><s%> shall be gathered <S%H6908><s%> there, <S%H8033><s%> Every <S%H802><s%> one <S%H376><s%> with its kind. <S%H7468><s%>

Seek <S%H1875><s%> from the book <S%H5612><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> and read: <S%H7121><s%> Not one <S%H259><s%> of these <S%H2007><s%> will be missing; <S%H5737><s%> None <S%H802><s%> <S%H3808><s%> will lack <S%H6485><s%> its mate. <S%H7468><s%> For His mouth <S%H6310><s%> has commanded, <S%H6680><s%> And His Spirit <S%H7307><s%> has gathered <S%H6908><s%> them.

And He has cast <S%H5307><s%> the lot <S%H1486><s%> for them, And His hand <S%H3027><s%> has divided <S%H2505><s%> it to them by line. <S%H6957><s%> They shall possess <S%H3423><s%> it forever <S%H5704><s%>; <S%H5769><s%> From generation <S%H1755><s%> to generation <S%H1755><s%> they shall dwell <S%H7931><s%> in it.
